codeSystems.name: EvalStatusVS
codeSystems.title: Evaluation Status Value Set
codeSystems.description: Value Set for the status of the result of an evaluation.

codeSystems.name: IntervalReasonVS
codeSystems.title: Interval Reason
codeSystems.description: This value set includes codes for the reason an interval is considered to be invalid.

codeSystems.name: PreferredAllowedReasonVS
codeSystems.title: Reasons why certain doses are Preferred or Allowed doses
codeSystems.description: Reasons why certain doses are Preferred or Allowed doses

codeSystems.name: VaccineGenderVS
codeSystems.title: Vaccine Gender
codeSystems.description: Value set for gender categories relevant to vaccination data.

codeSystems.name: ValidAgeReasonVS
codeSystems.title: Valid Age Reason
codeSystems.description: Value set for reasons why a patient's age is considered valid/invalid for a vaccine.

codeSystems.name: AdministrativeGender
codeSystems.title: AdministrativeGender
codeSystems.description: The gender of a person used for administrative purposes.

codeSystems.name: CommonLanguages
codeSystems.title: Common Languages
codeSystems.description: This value set includes common codes from BCP-47 (http://tools.ietf.org/html/bcp47)

codeSystems.name: LinkType
codeSystems.title: LinkType
codeSystems.description: The type of link between this patient resource and another patient resource.

codeSystems.name: Marital Status Codes
codeSystems.title: MaritalStatus
codeSystems.description: This value set defines the set of codes that can be used to indicate the marital status of a person.

codeSystems.name: PatientContactRelationship
codeSystems.title: Patient Contact Relationship
codeSystems.description: The nature of the relationship between the patient and the contact person.
